entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then clearing. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow at times. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 8:10 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:10 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:10 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
